backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing CRUD operations for notes (with title/content) and tasks (with description/completion status), using Map data structures and auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: notes management system, to-do list system, cute aesthetic theme, and decorative image rendering with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and styling approach.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables defining a cute aesthetic color system using OKLCH color space for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Cute Notes' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for notes and todos pages, wrapped in a shared layout with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddTodoForm.tsx: Form component for adding new tasks with decorative star icon, input field, and submit button using gradient styling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with sticky header navigation between notes/todos, gradient background, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Card component displaying individual notes with title/content, edit/delete buttons that appear on hover, and conditional styling for editing state.
frontend/src/components/NoteEditor.tsx: A form component for creating and editing notes with title and content fields, using mutations to save changes and displaying loading states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/NotesList.tsx: Displays a list of notes using NoteCard components, handles loading states, and shows an empty state message when no notes exist.
frontend/src/components/TodoItem.tsx: Renders a single task item with a checkbox to toggle completion status and a delete button, with visual styling that changes based on completion state.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Displays all tasks grouped into incomplete and completed sections, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on notes and tasks, using the actor from useActor and managing cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind CSS, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and Nunito font family configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Main notes page component that manages state for creating/editing notes and renders a two-column layout with NotesList and NoteEditor components, featuring a gradient header with animated cloud icon.
frontend/src/pages/TodoPage.tsx: Todo page component that renders a simple layout with an animated star icon header and displays AddTodoForm and TodoList components for task management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, custom animations, Nunito font family, soft shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a cute notes and to-do app with four implemented features (notes CRUD, todo list, cute aesthetic theme, and decorative images) and three pending feature requests.
